title: Non-aqueous secondary battery

events.title: Application filed by Japan Storage Battery Co Ltd

abstract:
PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To provide a non-aqueous secondary battery that contains a lithium- manganese compound oxide as a positive active material and is superior in high-rate discharge characteristics and charge and discharge cycle characteristics.

SOLUTION: This is a non-aqueous secondary battery that comprises a positive electrode in which a positive active material layer containing lithium- transition metal compound oxide is formed on a foil-shape collector, a negative electrode, and a non-aqueous electrolyte. The positive active material layer has a thickness of 0.05 mm or more and 0.25 mm or less, and a packing density of 0.8 g/cm3or more and 5.0 g/cm3or less, and the lithium-transition metal compound oxide contains a monoclinic LixMnaM1-aO2(M is an element of one kind or more selected from Al, Fe, Co, Ni, and Cr, 0COPYRIGHT: (C)2003,JPO
claims:
【特許請求の範囲】
【請求項１】  箔状の集電体上にリチウム遷移金属複合酸化物を含む正極活物質層が形成されてなる正極と、負極と、非水電解質とからなる非水系二次電池において、前記正極活物質層は、厚さが０．０５ｍｍ以上０．２５ｍｍ以下、かつ充填密度が０．８ｇ／ｃｍ３以上５．０ｇ／ｃｍ３以下であり、前記リチウム遷移金属複合酸化物は、層状岩塩型構造を有する、単斜晶ＬｉｘＭｎａＭ １−ａＯ２（Ｍは、Ａｌ、Ｆｅ、Ｃｏ、Ｎｉ、及びＣｒから選ばれる１種以上の元素、０＜ｘ≦１．１、  ０．５≦ａ＜１）を含有することを特徴とする非水系二次電池。Claims: 1. A nonaqueous system comprising a positive electrode in which a positive electrode active material layer containing a lithium transition metal composite oxide is formed on a foil-like current collector, a negative electrode, and a nonaqueous electrolyte. In secondary batteries,  The positive electrode active material layer has a thickness of 0.05 mm or more and 0.25  mm or less, and the packing density is 0.8 g / cm 3 or more and 5.0.  g / cm 3 or less, and the lithium transition metal composite oxide has a layered rock-salt structure, and is monoclinic Li x Mn a M   1-a O 2 (M is, Al, Fe, Co, Ni , and Cr  0 <x ≦ 1.1, at least one element selected from the group consisting of:  A non-aqueous secondary battery comprising 5 ≦ a <1).
